hero.headline: Get Involved
hero.textline: Every year, we host nearly 100 events. Events have a variety of topics, ranging from interview advice to socials to workshops. Here are some of our more notable events:

blocks.content:
## H.A.R.D. Hack

***

HARD Hack is a 24-hour hardware hackathon HKN holds annually in collaboration with IEEE. We provide the materials and the tools needed to make a hardware hack. Come out and build something cool! Anyone can attend, regardless of skill level.

***

## ECE Day

***

Join us to learn, network, and grow at our annual ECE Day! Our mission is to celebrate everything that encompasses the spirit of Electrical and Computer Engineering and bring awareness of all that it offers to its students, faculty, and beloved alumni. Enjoy workshops, networking opportunities, and more!

***

## Honors Career Fair

***

The Honors Career Fair is an effort to provide the best networking experience between our school’s engineers and tech professionals. In this gathering between company representatives, alumni, and students. All attendees will have the opportunity to converse with anyone in attendance, strike up group discussion topics, and form deeper connections.

## 

***

## Honors Recruiting

***

Every year, Eta Kappa Nu at UC San Diego holds an **Honors Recruiting Event**!, exclusive to our undergraduate and graduate honor students of each engineering department at UC San Diego. Come to meet face-to-face with top companies seeking to hire you. Some companies come specifically for this event, so be sure not to miss it!

***

## Outreach

***

HKN also provides outreach to schools around the San Diego area to foster interest in the engineering field. We do this through creating project-based curricula to introduce various fields of engineering to K-12 students. UCSD engineering students have the ability to contribute to the development of these curricula and gain various technical, professional, and communication skills, as well as class credit, through signing up for our class. Please reach out to the outreach officers if you are interested in participating.

***

If you are a company that has professionals interested in networking with or meeting our top engineering students, please [contact us](/contact) for more information or email us at [hkn@eng.ucsd.edu](mailto:hkn@eng.ucsd.edu).
